USE sales_ldw;
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE silver.sp_silver_dim_employee
AS
BEGIN
    IF OBJECT_ID('silver.dim_product') IS NOT NULL
        DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.dim_product;


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.dim_product(    
	[ProductKey] [int] 1,
  [ProductKey], 
  [ProductSubcategoryKey], 
  [EnglishProductName] as [Product Name], 
  EnglishProductCategoryName as Category, 
  EnglishProductSubcategoryName as Subcategory, 
  [StandardCost], 
  [Color], 
  [ModelName], 
  ISNULL(Status, 'Outdated') as Status )
WITH ( 
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,
        LOCATION = 'silver/dim_product',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    );

SELECT TOP 10 * FROM bronze.dim_date;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.dim_product
    WITH
    (
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,
        LOCATION = 'silver/dim_product',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
SELECT 
  [ProductKey], 
  p.[ProductSubcategoryKey], 
  [EnglishProductName] as [Product Name], 
  EnglishProductCategoryName as Category, 
  EnglishProductSubcategoryName as Subcategory, 
  [StandardCost], 
  [Color], 
  [ModelName], 
  ISNULL(Status, 'Outdated') as Status 
FROM 
  bronze.dim_product p 
  JOIN bronze.dim_product_subcategory pc on p.ProductSubcategoryKey = pc.ProductSubcategoryKey 
  JOIN bronze.dim_product_category pg on pc.ProductCategoryKey = pg.ProductCategoryKey;

END;

EXEC silver.sp_silver_dim_customer;
SELECT * FROM silver.dim_customer;
